entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
